mapper.select: select `id`,`num_copies`,`apply_unit_is_bear`,`design_is_year`,`design_is_cert`,`unit_is_three_safe`,`bureau_is_first_award`,`superior_is_opionion`,`apply_source_question`,`feedback_info`,`pro_contact`,`main_user`,`standard_is_desc`,`department_is_approve`,`two_user_is_use`,`economic_is_cert`,`bureau_award_is_cert`,`review_result`,`remarks`,`opt_uid`,`pro_id`,`task_id`,`created`,`updated`, approve_is_publish from ass_surver_review_standard_result where id = #{value}
mapper.delete:
delete from ass_surver_review_standard_result where id in
#{id}
